solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int getMaxRepetitions(String s1, int n1, String s2, int n2) {--newline--        char[] array1 = s1.toCharArray(), array2 = s2.toCharArray();--newline--        int count1 = 0, count2 = 0, i = 0, j = 0;--newline--        --newline--        while (count1 < n1) {--newline--            if (array1[i] == array2[j]) {--newline--                j++;--newline--                if (j == array2.length) {--newline--                    j = 0;--newline--                    count2++;--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--            i++;--newline--            if (i == array1.length) {--newline--                i = 0;--newline--                count1++;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        return count2 / n2;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
